com.ebay.lightning.client

Class LightningClient.LightningClientImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ebay.lightning.client.LightningClient.LightningClientImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LightningClient
    Enclosing interface:
    LightningClient

    public static class LightningClient.LightningClientImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements LightningClient
    LightningClientImpl is the one and only implementation of LightningClient as of version 1.0 This class is package protected to discourage direct instantiation. LightningClientBuild should be used to instantiate LightningClient
    Author:
    shashukla

      • pollResponse

        public com.ebay.lightning.core.beans.LightningResponse pollResponse(com.ebay.lightning.core.beans.LightningRequest req,
                                                                    boolean pollDeltaOnly)
        Description copied from interface: LightningClient
        Poll the current result for request. The method returns the complete or partial response based on the current state of the request.
        Specified by:
        pollResponse in interface LightningClient
        Parameters:
        req - the LightningRequest object returned by LightningClient.submit(List) method
        pollDeltaOnly - get full or delta response
        Returns:
        LightningResponse that has the current state of task execution

      • getAuditReport

        public com.ebay.lightning.core.store.LightningRequestReport getAuditReport(com.ebay.lightning.core.beans.LightningRequest req)
        Description copied from interface: LightningClient
        Get the detailed execution report for the request in compressed format. This method is usually called after the complete execution of the request. The execution state of the method can be polled with LightningClient.pollResponse(LightningRequest, boolean) method.
        Specified by:
        getAuditReport in interface LightningClient
        Parameters:
        req - the LightningRequest object returned by LightningClient.submit(List) method
        Returns:
        LightningRequestReport that has the detailed execution report

      • getAuditReport

        public com.ebay.lightning.core.store.LightningRequestReport getAuditReport(java.lang.String sessionId,
                                                                           java.lang.String servingHostIp)
        Description copied from interface: LightningClient
        Get the detailed execution report for the request in compressed format. This method is usually called after the complete execution of the request. The execution state of the method can be polled with LightningClient.pollResponse(LightningRequest, boolean) method.
        Specified by:
        getAuditReport in interface LightningClient
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the sessionId from LightningRequest
        servingHostIp - the lightning core host that executed the task with the specific sessionId
        Returns:
        LightningRequestReport that has the detailed execution report in compressed format

        Parameters:
        sessionId - the sessionId from LightningRequest
        servingHostIp - the lightning core host that executed the task with the specific sessionId
